analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/11/0x15f503f23d4d2716e0817714709b5dcf868013ee.sol:
	Contract SapiencyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0x15f503f23d4d2716e0817714709b5dcf868013ee.sol#202-206)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

SapiencyToken._decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x15f503f23d4d2716e0817714709b5dcf868013ee.sol#162-164)
SapiencyToken._name should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x15f503f23d4d2716e0817714709b5dcf868013ee.sol#158-160)
SapiencyToken._standard should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x15f503f23d4d2716e0817714709b5dcf868013ee.sol#161-162)
SapiencyToken._symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0x15f503f23d4d2716e0817714709b5dcf868013ee.sol#160)
